title: Cuda Scan Ground Segmentation Filter Node Params

global_slope_max_angle_deg.description: Maximum global ground slope angle [deg]. Larger values reduce false negatives on steep roads but can increase false positives (classifying objects as ground).

local_slope_max_angle_deg.description: Maximum local slope angle [deg] between adjacent points (used for fine discrimination of small objects or ramps).

non_ground_height_threshold.description: Absolute vertical distance threshold [m] above estimated ground line to classify a point as non-ground.

grid_size_m.description: Radial cell size in polar grid [m]; larger values smooth ground estimation but may miss small objects.

gnd_cell_buffer_size.description: Number of previous ground cells used to estimate local ground slope.

detection_range_z_max.description: Maximum Z height (above base_link) considered in classification [m].

center_pcl_shift.description: X-axis offset [m] applied to additional LiDAR point clouds relative to vehicle reference (positive forward).

sector_angle_deg.description: Angular width of each polar sector [deg].

use_recheck_ground_cluster.description: Enable secondary pass to re-evaluate ground clusters (may reduce false ground on elevated points).

recheck_start_distance.description: Minimum radial distance [m] at which ground cluster recheck logic begins.

use_lowest_point.description: Use lowest point in cell as reference during ground recheck (otherwise median-like selection).

min_x.description: Minimum X range relative to base_link [m] included in processing.

max_x.description: Maximum X (forward) range relative to base_link [m] included in processing.

min_y.description: Minimum Y range relative to base_link [m] included in processing.

max_y.description: Maximum Y range relative to base_link [m] included in processing.

min_z.description: Minimum Z range relative to base_link [m] included in processing.

max_z.description: Maximum Z range relative to base_link [m] included in processing.
